about_intro_content: I am a Frontend Developer with over 3 years of experience building modern web applications. I am passionate about creating great user experiences and constantly learning new technologies.
experience_1_description: Led a team of 5 in developing large web projects, optimizing workflows and mentoring junior developers.
experience_2_description: Developed complex React applications, integrated AI, and optimized performance.
experience_3_description: Built user interfaces and integrated APIs for e-commerce projects.
education_1_school: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
project_1_results_content: The project successfully created a robust e-commerce platform capable of handling thousands of transactions daily. Conversion rates increased by 20% thanks to the intelligent product recommendation feature. The system is stable and easily scalable to meet market demands.
